title: When translating, the snap to grid hotkey doesn't work together with XYZ keys

content.raw:
Dragging the model on translate mode (dragging the model directly, not one of the 3 arrows) translates the model on the XY plane. Holding the Ctrl key while dragging snaps to the 1 m grid.

While doing this, it's possible to hold the X, Y or Z keys to constrain the motion to these axes.

But if one tries to use the Ctrl key to snap to grid while holding X, Y or Z, the dragging behavior goes back to being on the XY plane.
